content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #294

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 88

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Quick Start
Section: Building a CDS Service
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

4. Create a SMART app (or borrow one)
5. Test the service and SMART app with an EHR

Proposed Wording:

4. If applicable, create a SMART app (or borrow one)
5. If applicable, test the service and SMART app with an EHR

Comment:
SMART apps aren't a required component of CDS Hooks, so don't imply that building a CDS Service requires a SMART App.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #294

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Will update as suggested

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #294

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment:
Will update as suggested

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
